recipe.title: Dulce De Leche Swirl 3-ingredient Fudge Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: Â½ cup ; dulce de leche ; (150 g)

steps.step: In a mixing bowl, combine chocolate with sweetened condensed milk and melt in the microwave in 15-second increments.
Once chocolate is fully melted pour into a parchment paper-lined 8x8 inch (20x20 cm) baking tin.
Dollop your dulce de leche and make ribbons by swirling chocolate mixture.
Chill for 2 hours or until the fudge is firm.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a mixing bowl, combine chocolate with sweetened condensed milk and melt in the microwave in 15-second increments.
Once chocolate is fully melted pour into a parchment paper-lined 8x8 inch (20x20 cm) baking tin.
Dollop your dulce de leche and make ribbons by swirling chocolate mixture.
Chill for 2 hours or until the fudge is firm.
